      • generateToken

        public static java.lang.String generateToken(User user,
                             javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                                      throws KudosException
        Generates a JWT for the given user and places the token within the Authorization header
        Parameters:
        user - The user object to generate a token for
        response - The HttpServletResponse to place the token into
        Returns:
        The JSON Web Token
        Throws:
        KudosException

      • validateToken

        public static User validateToken(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest httpRequest,
                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                          throws KudosException
        Validates the JWT from the incoming request
        Parameters:
        httpRequest - The HttpServletRequest that should contain the JWT
        response - The response that will obtain an updated JWT with an extended 15min expiry time
        Returns:
        The User object associated with the request and within the JWT
        Throws:
        KudosException
